attributes.action: take urgent action on the findings of the Unicef report that clearly places the UK at the bottom of the 21 most advanced nations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children and young people are the UK's(and the World's) greatest resource. Why are British children: poorer,at greater risk and more insecure?

We need urgent action from Government to change and improve the life chances and aspirations of young people in the UK.The Government needs to provide a substantial increase in finance and a much clearer encouragement for youth work and youth development. 

Our young people deserve more!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
